name: Potion Quest!
description: This is a puzzle game where the goal is to collect all potions and the minimum amount of money needed and leave before time runs out or without dying. You control a magical alchemist named Zenn, who has to go searching for different potions and collect money along the way to finish thier alchemy internship.  Zenn didn't make a good impression with thier boss, so they have to go searching for potions and money in a place full of dangers. Help Zenn prove thier boss wrong by getting them out alive in time with all the items.
